data.name: Anomalous
data.detailed_description:
Anomalous takes place in Kosolov. A grim industrial city. Kosolov is a highly controlled and secretive society. It's an industrialized nation. With overwhelming authority and a devotion to its leaders, the citizens endlessly work to death. A hard divide between the secretive upper society and the majority brainwashed working class ensures continuation. Effectively shunned from the rest of the world, leaders of Kosolov have been free to fast-track their unethical scientific experiments to enhance their tyrannical military capabilities and workforce.

To create the ultimate controllable and mindless workforce Kosolov had put in place a plan to revive the dead and set them back to work - benefitting from already high mortality rate. Scientists have attempted mechanical implants, regenerative biomass, and a host of bizarre experiments. With numerous unforeseen consequences resulting in a catastrophic disaster, the only thing left to do is battle your way out of the city.

Anomalous in current early access contains the first episode of the game which contains 10 levels. Each episode will contain 10 unique levels similar to the shooters of the 90s which it takes inspiration from.

data.short_description: A SHORT and sweet pixelated low fidelity 90s throwback hyper-fast action shooter. Survive and fight through a city overrun with manufactured monstrosities, biomass horrors, and a military authority trying to purge everything living. Featuring a heavy metal / techno soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (3.70 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: intel Core i5-4590 (3.70 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Scenes of violence and gore. No depictions of sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
